servinfo.title: Fuel Tank Inlet Valve Removal and Installation

attention1.ptxt: Before starting the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service in order to reduce the risk or fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Insert hose of a hand operated pump into fuel filler hose (1) and drain fuel in space “A” as shown in figure.

attention2.ptxt: Do not force pump hose into fuel tank, or pump hose may damage to fuel tank inlet valve (2).

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle, and remove clamp (2) and fuel filler hose (1) from fuel filler neck.
Remove fuel tank inlet valve (1) using flat head rod (2) or the like.

attention2.ptxt: Be careful not to damage fuel tank inlet valve (1) with flat head rod (2) or the like.

s1.ptxt: Install fuel tank inlet valve (1) to fuel tank.
Install fuel filler hose (1) to fuel tank and secure it with clamp (2).
For proper installation, refer to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting .
Lower vehicle and install fuel filler cap.
